label: Description
value: Fragment of stylized floral and foliated forms in a large scale symmetric scroll design. Pattern connected by brides, picotées, and is interspersed by gaze quadrillée and portes.

label: Credit line
value: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf

label: Description
value: Panel of lace with three horizontal bands divided into eight squares each, depicting scenes from the biblical story in which Judith severs Holoferne's head to save her people. With geometric edging on three sides; cut on the right.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with needle lace, reticella style

value: This was previously in the collection of Madame Jules Porges. See research folder.
